whodonedidit.skeletons

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • whodonedidit.skeletons.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Deck is used to create all of clue cards and action cards being used by the game. After the clue cards have been dealt out, the deck serves to hold all of the remaining action cards that haven't been drawn yet.
    Since:
    25-Oct-2015

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<ActionCard> actionCards
      List of ActionCards being held by the deck.
      private java.util.List<ClueCard> clueCards
      List of ClueCard objects being held by the deck
      private int topActionCard
      Integer to point at the first action card in the actionCards list
      private int topClueCard
      Integer to point at the first clue card in the clueCards list

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Creates the deck of 21 ClueCards and 39 ActionCards.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean actionIsEmpty()
      Checks to see whether this deck is out of action cards.

      Finds the first clue card is this deck that matches the given description.
      void populateDeck()
      Generates and stores all of the initial clue cards and action cards for this deck.
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles the cards being held in the clueCards and actionCards lists.

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle()
        Shuffles the cards being held in the clueCards and actionCards lists.

      • findClueCard

        public ClueCard findClueCard(java.util.List<java.lang.String> description)
        Finds the first clue card is this deck that matches the given description. This is mostly used for finding the person, vehicle, and destination to form the solution to the game.
        Parameters:
        description - of the card requested
        Returns:
        the first ClueCard with a matching description

      • drawActionCard

        public ActionCard drawActionCard()
        Draws an action card from the front of the actionCards list.
        Returns:
        the ActionCard object being held in the actionCards list

      • drawClueCard

        public ClueCard drawClueCard()
        Draws a clue card from the front of this deck's clueCards list.
        Returns:
        the ClueCard object being held in the clueCards list

      • addActionCard

        public void addActionCard(ActionCard card)
        Adds the passed action card back into the deck's actionCards list.
        Parameters:
        card - the ActionCard being returned to the deck

      • addClueCard

        public void addClueCard(ClueCard card)
        Adds the clue card back into this deck's clueCards list.
        Parameters:
        card - the ClueCard object being returned to the deck

        Checks to see whether this deck is out of clue cards.

        Returns:
